userMigrated.title: Account Error
userMigrated.desc: You attempted to login with a migrated account. Try again with the account email as the username!

invalidCredentials.title: Account Error
invalidCredentials.desc: Your email or password is incorrect!

rateLimit.title:
Login Error:
Too Many Attempts
rateLimit.desc: There has been too many login attempts with this account recently. Try again later!

noInternet.title:
Login Error:
No Internet Connection
noInternet.desc: You must be connected to the internet in order to login. Connect and try again!

authDown.title:
Login Error:
Authentication Server Offline
authDown.desc: Mojang's authentication server is currently offline or unreachable, wait a moment and try again. You can check the server status on Mojang's Help Portal!

notPaid.title:
Login Error:
Game Not Purchased
notPaid.desc:
The account you tried to login with has not purchased a copy of Minecraft.
You may purchase a copy at Minecraft.net!
